client_sdks.notes: Maximize ecosystem adoption; avoid copyleft contagion for clients.

enterprise_modules.description: Proprietary performance/operations modules (kernels, receipts pipeline, compaction, storeless ops).

reference_server.notes: AGPL for open use; commercial license for proprietary integration.

specs_and_schemas.description: Specification text, JSON schemas, wire formats.
specs_and_schemas.notes: Ideas/formats are generally not copyrightable; permissive license clarifies reuse.

trademarks.description: Marks such as HyperSync, CTVS, etc.
trademarks.notes: Use of marks conditioned on passing conformance profiles.
